Address.label: Address
Address.value: FIVE CONCOURSE PARKWAY SUITE 300, ATLANTA, Georgia, 30328, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Atlanticus Holdings Corp invests in the financial services industry. It provides various credit and related financial services and products to or associated with the financially underserved consumer credit market. The operating business segments are the Credit as a Service and the Auto Finance segment. It generates maximum revenue from the Credit as a Service segment.
